name: Mark of the Kindred
description: Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a  takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 75 − 250 (based on Marks)  bonus range on her basic attacks and abilities.
descriptions: Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a  takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 75 − 250 (based on Marks)  bonus range on her basic attacks and abilities.

Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of enemy  champions to take down, which is hidden while in combat with an enemy champion. Once selected, there's an 8 second delay before the Mark can be collected, and Lamb can change her target if the target hasn't died during a period of time. Targets successfully hunted cannot be targeted again for 4 minutes.

Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically selects a  monster camp within the enemy's jungle based on Lamb's current Marks for 180 seconds:
 0 :  Rift Scuttler
 1 – 3:  Rift Scuttler,  Crimson Raptor,  Gromp
 4 – 7:  Ancient Krug,  Blue Sentinel,  Greater Murk Wolf, or  Red Brambleback
 8 + :  Rift Herald or  Baron Nashor,  Dragon or  Elder Dragon

Wolf will select another monster camp 40 seconds after killing a marked monster. If an ally kills a hunted jungle monster within 6 seconds of Kindred damaging it, Kindred will still acquire the stack.
The marked camp is highlighted on the mini map to both teams. The mark is removed when the camp is cleared even if Kindred are not involved.

name: Dance of Arrows
description: Active: Lamb  dashes in the target direction, gaining  25% (+ 5% per  Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and firing up to three arrows to nearby  visible targets after dashing, each one dealing physical damage. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
descriptions: Active: Lamb  dashes in the target direction, gaining  25% (+ 5% per  Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and firing up to three arrows to nearby  visible targets after dashing, each one dealing physical damage. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.
Casting  Wolf's Frenzy or using Dance of Arrows while inside its area will reduce this ability's  cooldown to an amount.
Lamb can cast any of her abilities during Dance of Arrows'  dash.
Dance of Arrows  resets Lamb's basic attack timer.

name: Wolf's Frenzy
description: Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack  heals her for up to 49 − 100 (based on level), based on Kindred's missing health.
leveling: Magic Damage:25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per Mark) of target's current health)
levelings: Magic Damage:25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 20% bonus AD) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per  Mark) of target's current health)
descriptions: Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack  heals her for up to 49 − 100 (based on level), based on Kindred's missing health.

Active: Wolf  dashes to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf autonomously attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.
Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks  slow the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area or dies.

name: Mounting Dread
description: Active: Lamb applies a mark to the target enemy for 4 seconds and cripples them,  slowing them by 50% for 1 second.
leveling: Bonus Physical Damage:80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per Mark) of target's missing health)
levelings: Bonus Physical Damage:80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 80% bonus AD) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per  Mark) of target's missing health)
descriptions: Active: Lamb applies a mark to the target enemy for 4 seconds and cripples them,  slowing them by 50% for 1 second.

Lamb's attacks against the target refreshes the mark's duration. If she manages to basic attack the marked target twice, her third attack directs Wolf to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against  monsters.
Wolf's pounce will  critically strike for (50% +  37.5%) bonus physical damage against targets below 15% − 65% (based on critical strike chance) of their  maximum health.

name: Lamb's Respite
description: Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a 0.264 seconds cast time. All units inside the zone cannot be reduced below  10% of their maximum health, and will become  invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be  healed, but can still  regenerate health.
descriptions: Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a 0.264 seconds cast time. All units inside the zone cannot be reduced below  10% of their maximum health, and will become  invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be  healed, but can still  regenerate health.
All targetable units within the zone are  healed immediately when the blessing ends.
